scripts.lint:ts:starter: bash -lc 'cd _starter-projects/nextjs16 && test -d node_modules || npm ci --no-audit --no-fund && ../../node_modules/.bin/tsgo -p tsconfig.json --noEmit' && echo 'TypeScript linting (_starter-projects) complete'
scripts.lint:ts:scenarios: bash -lc 'set -euo pipefail; for d in _scenarios/*; do test -f "$d/tsconfig.json" || continue; (cd "$d" && test -d node_modules || npm ci --no-audit --no-fund && ../../node_modules/.bin/tsgo -p tsconfig.json --noEmit); done' && echo 'TypeScript linting (_scenarios) complete'
scripts.lint:ts: yarn lint:ts:scripts && yarn lint:ts:starter && yarn lint:ts:scenarios
